On Jan 11, 2009, at 1:33 PM, Aristotle Pagaltzis wrote:

> My suggestion was
>
>    example.org/en/somedoc
>
> which is easier to hack and in some web frameworks also easier to
> dispatch (because the language is in a fixed place in the URI).


I like this URI structure, but doing so because of "some" web  
frameworks is about the worst reason imaginable.

- Steve
